guidelines: Use TypeScript for all Remotion components for type safety
Keep video components modular and reusable
Export compositions in multiple formats for different platforms
Optimize rendering performance by using useCurrentFrame() efficiently
Use spring() for natural, physics-based animations
Test videos at different frame rates before final render
Use Sequence for timing multiple animations
Cache heavy computations outside of render loop
best_practices: Structure projects with clear composition hierarchy
Use props for configurable video content
Implement progress indicators for long renders
